abstract.text: A list template row that represents a conversation or contact.

legalNotices.copyright: Copyright © 2025 Apple Inc. All rights reserved.

inlineContent.text: to display information about a conversation or a contact in a list template. Unlike
, you don’t provide a selection handler. Instead, when the user selects the row, CarPlay invokes Siri using the parameters you provide and begins a message compose, read, or reply flow.

The behavior of the list item when the user selects it depends on how you initialize or configure it. If the item has a phone number or email address, Siri launches the message compose flow. If the list item has an unread indicator, Siri launches the message read flow. Otherwise, Siri launches the message reply flow.
can display various auxiliary items in its leading and trailing regions. You describe these using a configuration object for each region. See
CarPlay doesn’t support custom list item types. Instead, use the
property to attach a value to the list item that provides additional context, such as specifying  a model object that corresponds to the item.
is available only in apps that have the communication entitlement.

abstract.text: Integrate CarPlay in apps related to audio, communication, navigation, parking, EV charging, food ordering, and more.

The root class of most Objective-C class hierarchies, from which subclasses inherit a basic interface to the runtime system and the ability to behave as Objective-C objects.
The group of methods that are fundamental to all Objective-C objects.
